job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Report
       Strategies to transition to the new stage of data and AI
     * eBook
       Discover how to build and manage all your data, analytics and AI use cases.
     * Report
       Scaling AI: Key Data Priorities
       Findings from 600 CIOs across 14 industries
     * August-November 2023
       Generation AI is coming to you! Join us to explore all things data, analytics and AI on Lakehouse.
     * Generative AI Fundamentals
       Build foundational knowledge, including how to use LLMs in your organization, with 4 videos
     * Ready to get started?
       Sr. Spark Technical Solutions Engineer
       Amsterdam, Netherlands
       CSQ125R3
       As a Senior Spark Technical Solutions Engineer, you will provide technical and consulting related solutions for the challenging Spark/ML/AI/Delta/Streaming/Lakehouse reported issues by our customers and resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform with your comprehensive technical and client-facing skills. You will assist our customers in their Databricks journey and provide them with the guidance and expertise that they need to accomplish value and achieve their strategic goals using our products. You will join the EMEA Technical Solutions team based in Amsterdam, Netherlands reporting to the Manager of Spark Technical Solutions.
       The impact you will have:
     * Provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions developed by Databricks customers.
     * Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta, Lakehouse and other Databricks runtime features.
     * Assist the customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions in the areas of Spark SQL, Delta, Memory Management, Performance tuning, Streaming, Data Science and Data Integration areas in Spark.
     * Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services for coordinating customer issues and best practices guidelines.
     * Coordinate with Engineering and Backline Support teams to help report Product defects.
     * Help create company documentation and knowledge articles.
     * Participate in weekend (infrequent) and weekday (normal business hrs) on-call rotation.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Spark Technical Solutions Engineer

* Report
       Strategies to transition to the new stage of data and AI
     * eBook
       Discover how to build and manage all your data, analytics and AI use cases.
     * Report
       Scaling AI: Key Data Priorities
       Findings from 600 CIOs across 14 industries
     * August-November 2023
       Generation AI is coming to you! Join us to explore all things data, analytics and AI on Lakehouse.
     * Generative AI Fundamentals
       Build foundational knowledge, including how to use LLMs in your organization, with 4 videos
     * Ready to get started?
       Sr. Spark Technical Solutions Engineer
       Amsterdam, Netherlands
       CSQ125R3
       As a Senior Spark Technical Solutions Engineer, you will provide technical and consulting related solutions for the challenging Spark/ML/AI/Delta/Streaming/Lakehouse reported issues by our customers and resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform with your comprehensive technical and client-facing skills. You will assist our customers in their Databricks journey and provide them with the guidance and expertise that they need to accomplish value and achieve their strategic goals using our products. You will join the EMEA Technical Solutions team based in Amsterdam, Netherlands reporting to the Manager of Spark Technical Solutions.
       The impact you will have:
     * Provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions developed by Databricks customers.
     * Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta, Lakehouse and other Databricks runtime features.
     * Assist the customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions in the areas of Spark SQL, Delta, Memory Management, Performance tuning, Streaming, Data Science and Data Integration areas in Spark.
     * Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services for coordinating customer issues and best practices guidelines.
     * Coordinate with Engineering and Backline Support teams to help report Product defects.
     * Help create company documentation and knowledge articles.
     * Participate in weekend (infrequent) and weekday (normal business hrs) on-call rotation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on providing technical solutions and consulting for issues related to Databricks, Spark, and related data/AI technologies. While it mentions AI and ML, the core responsibilities revolve around troubleshooting, code-level analysis, and guiding customers on existing platforms and features rather than designing, building, or fine-tuning novel AI models or generative AI applications. The emphasis is on supporting customer use cases and resolving reported issues within a specific platform, which aligns more with a technical solutions or support role than a dedicated ML or GenAI Engineering role. The mention of 'Generative AI Fundamentals' and 'Scaling AI' in the preamble seems to be marketing content rather than core job requirements.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves assisting customers in their 'Databricks journey' and providing guidance to 'accomplish value and achieve their strategic goals using our products,' which requires understanding business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: achieve their strategic goals using our products

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding customer needs to provide technical and consulting solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: provide technical and consulting related solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves troubleshooting and resolving issues related to Delta Lake and Lakehouse architecture, which are core components of data engineering.
The role requires assisting customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems related to data integration, a key aspect of data engineering.
The job involves resolving issues related to Spark's Data Science capabilities, which includes aspects of model development and application.
The role requires deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues, implying a need for strong software development and debugging skills within the Spark ecosystem.
The role involves assisting customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions, indicating a need to develop and test code.
job_tasks.phrase: setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role requires troubleshooting and resolving issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, and performance tuning, which are operational aspects of maintaining and optimizing data processing systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Memory Management, Performance tuning

job_tasks.justification: The role involves coordinating with Engineering and Backline Support to report product defects, a key part of operational feedback and improvement.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services
Coordinate with Engineering and Backline Support teams
provide them with the guidance and expertise that they need
Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis
Provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions
